statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claimant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claimant_name FROM insurance_claim WHERE policy_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY policy_id ASC, claim_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE claimant_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id FROM insurance_claim WHERE policy_id = 5 AND claim_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claimant_name FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount >= 3000 ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM claim_approval WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT insurance_claims.claim_id, insurance_claims.policy_holder_name, claim_approval.approval_status FROM insurance_claims JOIN claim_approval ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claim_approval.claim_id;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount, approval_status FROM insurance_claims JOIN claim_approval ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claim_approval.claim_id ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claimant_id, claimant_name, email FROM claimants ORDER BY claimant_name DESC;

SELECT claim_history.claim_id, claim_history.claim_date, claim_history.updated_by, insurance_claims.claim_amount FROM claim_history INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON claim_history.claim_id = insurance_claims.claim_id;
SELECT claimant_name, email, phone_number, address FROM claimants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_number, claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claimant_name, email, phone_number FROM claimants ORDER BY claimant_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM claim_history WHERE claim_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;

SELECT claimants.claimant_name, insurance_claims.claim_type, claim_history.updated_by FROM claimants INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON claimants.claimant_id = insurance_claims.policy_number INNER JOIN claim_history ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, address FROM Policyholders WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Insurers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT policy_id, insurer_id, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT claim_id, policy_id FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT p.policyholder_name, c.claim_amount FROM Policyholders p INNER JOIN Claims c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.status = 'pending';
SELECT i.insurer_name, COUNT(c.contract_id) AS contract_count FROM Insurers i INNER JOIN Contracts c ON i.insurer_id = c.insurer_id GROUP BY i.insurer_name ORDER BY contract_count DESC;

SELECT c.*, p.policyholder_name, i.insurer_name FROM Contracts c INNER JOIN Policyholders p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id INNER JOIN Insurers i ON c.insurer_id = i.insurer_id WHERE c.end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim_details;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM claim_details WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, premium_amount, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_url FROM claim_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT approval_id, approver_name, approval_date FROM claim_approval WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim_details ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claimant_name ASC
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, premium_amount FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_status FROM claim_details WHERE claim_status='approved' AND claim_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT claim_documents.document_type, claim_documents.document_url, claim_details.claimant_name FROM claim_documents JOIN claim_details ON claim_documents.claim_id = claim_details.claim_id
SELECT approval_id, approver_name, approval_date FROM claim_approval ORDER BY approval_date ASC
